name: Secrete Mission
description:
School Project

“Secrete Mission” - Andressa Zhu

In 1189, wars broke out everywhere as kings fought for territory to strengthen their power. In a small isolated kingdom called Toutelyra, they did not want to participate in the war, but the world was a world of the weak are the prey of the strong, and they could not avoid it. The king of Toutelyra was informed that the king of Chafainada was training a powerful army at Stowerling Fortress. This could be detrimental to them, the king of Toutelyra ordered his most trusted troops, "The Shields of the Falcon" to investigate. 

Game Assets by:

"Gameboy Simple RPG tileset" - sonDanielson

"GB Studio Character pack" - Parabellum Games

"GB Studio Dungeon Tileset 8x8" - Rekkimaru

"GB Studio Tiles - Woodland" - PixelMech
